pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Wizard in Magic Land (2013, movie)$(br)Health: 45

Has a 10% chance to spawn from an $(l:wizard/mobs/mage_footsoldier)Imperial Guard$(/l) or an $(l:wizard/mobs/mage_captain)Imperial Captain$(/l)$(br2)Drops$(li)2-6 $(l:wizard/items/magic_stones#wizardgem)Orange Magic Stones$(/l)$(li)1-3 $(l:wizard/items/magic_stones#wizardgem_cyan)Cyan Magic Stones$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:wizard/items/magic_stones#wizardgem_black)Black Magic Stone$(/l)
